mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group of visitors at Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Luke C. Dillon, Photographer, Washington D. C. Office 935 Penn. Avenue, Pullman's Gallery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Group of visitors posed on the steps of the central entrance at the west front of the Mansion, 1884-1894. Photograph taken by 'official photographer to the Association' Luke C. Dillon. Reverse of the photographs indicates the picture was taken 'Apr 30 -3 (group 3).'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Visitors
